Class BurritoBuilder

java.lang.Object
  BurritoBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleSteak, SpicyVeggie
public class BurritoBuilder
extends Object

BurritoBuilder is a class to safely build a burrito, ensuring that the process is done correctly and input is validated.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Cody Moffitt
